name: RWBY Volume 3
summary: Rooster Teeth's award-winning animated web series RWBY is back at NYCC with RWBY: VOLUME 3 ! Join the cast and crew of RWBY, including Miles Luna, Kerry Shawcross, Gray Haddock, Lindsay Jones and Barbara Dunkelman, for an exclusive first look at scenes from the premiere episode of RWBY: VOLUME 3 ! Well also share exciting RWBY news, hilarious behind-the-scenes stories, take Q&A from the audience and more!
info:
• 中文名: 红白黑黄 第三季
  • 话数: 12
  • 放送开始: 2015年10月24日
  • 放送星期: 星期六
  • 原作: Monty Oum
  • 导演: Kerry Shawcross
  • 脚本: Monty Oum、Kerry Shawcross、Miles Luna
  • 音乐: Jeff Williams
  • 系列构成: Monty Oum
  • 主题歌演出: Casey Lee Williams
  • 制作: Koen Wooten
  • 动画制作: Rooster Teeth Productions
  • 副导演: Gray G. Haddock
  • 官方网站: http://roosterteeth.com/home.php
  • 播放结束: 2016年2月13日
  • 其他: WEB动画

eps.name: Round One
eps.desc: The Vytal Festival Tournament is the ultimate battle of skill, pitting the world's most powerful Huntsmen and Huntresses in training against one another... and it's finally here! Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang are back for a season of over-the-top action, and they're not alone. New fighters from around Remnant are ready to bring glory to their kingdom, but there are those among them with a far more sinister goal in mind…
